description: This file defines the main routing component for a React-based web frontend of a TicTacToe game. It includes navigation, route protection based on authentication, and imports of various page components.

methods.name: Navbar()
methods.description: Renders the navigation bar with links and user status, including logout functionality.

methods.name: RequireAuth
methods.description: A route guard component that ensures a user is authenticated before granting access to child components.

methods.name: AppRouter
methods.description: The main routing component that sets up application routes and integrates authentication-protected routes.
